amendatorysection.para: Sections 79-978 to 79-9,123 shall be known and may be cited as the Class V School Employees Retirement Act.

source.note: The Revisor of Statutes has pursuant to section 49-769 correlated LB31, section 1, with LB34, section 17, to reflect all amendments.
Changes made by LB34 became effective April 18, 2019. Changes made by LB31 became effective May 2, 2019.
